ComicInfo.Summary:
The race for the artifact is on and Juliette is charging head first at her real enemy, Adalind! This action-packed finale is filled with chases, fights, and maybe even a few explosions that need to be seen to be believed!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mary Sanapo & Chris O'Halloran | 1 | B | "Mask" Cover B | Kyle Strahm & Greg Smallwood | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Mary Sanapo | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Mary Sanapo | 4 |
